name: Crawlspace
description:
You saw an Ad about someone needing help with an odd job, retrieving his daughters missing dolls. Sounding like easy cash, you leave a message telling him you are interested. but as the nights progress, you realize why nobody else wanted to take this job.

----

Main Objective - Collect and return each missing doll from the crawlspace over 5 nights using a unique VR crawling mechanic.
Figure out how to stay safe from each doll with different attacks.
Relax at your home and enjoy some TV.


This game includes jumpscares.

VR Only
